thread.title: Totally loved everything about this hotel....all details covered.
thread.title_full: Totally loved everything about this hotel....all details covered. - Review of 1 Hotel Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DominosMom
title: Totally loved everything about this hotel....all details covered.
text: The only complaint I have is the smoke detector is located directly above the bed...or directly above your head. Even with my eyes closed, I could see the flashing light all night long. My colleagues complained of the same issue....so just sleep on your sides or wear an eye mask.
